name: The Mask Game (itch)
description:
This is a short, completely standalone side story set in an alternate timeline of the game R. I. P. Tour.

Features
  • 6 endings with CGs
Credits
  • Writing and art by Ghost Clown
  • Ending CGs by Brandy Wingo
  • Soundtrack by Benjamin Gear
  • Edited by H. King
  • Kinetic Text by Daniel Westfall
  • Voice blips made in ChipTone
